DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , 2-arm study compare pharmacokinetics CellCept mycophenolate sodium kidney transplant patient calcineurininhibitor-free mycophenolic acid-based therapy . On study day patient take prescribed medication ( either CellCept mycophenolate sodium ) . Blood sample draw directly interval 12 hour intake study medication . Anticipated time study treatment 12 hour target sample size 24 .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study CellCept ( Mycophenolate Mofetil ) Versus Mycophenolate Sodium Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: adult patient , > /=18 year age kidney transplantation > /=6 month ago mycophenolic acidbased , calcineurininhibitorfree therapy > /=3 month , > /=1 month stable dose cotherapy 5mg prednisone > /=1 month active gastrointestinal ulcus severe diarrhea od gastrointestinal disease severe impairment renal function current malignancy LeschNyhan KelleySeegmillerSyndrome
